about_the_game:
Experience a glimpse of Animacules, a 2D side-view microbial "City" Builder and Simulation game where you master the art of symbiosis and adaptability.
Immerse yourself in a vibrant, colorful, and hidden world as you cultivate a thriving colony of diverse microscopic organisms and gather essential resources like protein, minerals, and DNA.

This demo offers 1–2 hours of gameplay, introducing the core concepts of Animacules. Hone your skills in symbiotic microbe cultivation - will your colony thrive?

Demo Highlights:

  • Dive into a series of guided tutorial levels to learn the basics.

  • Care for your tiny inhabitants: cultivate 19 unique plants and 5 mobile cells, explore your surroundings, gather resources, and manage production.

  • Tackle an open demo scenario with increasingly challenging objectives. How big and vibrant can your colony become?

Road map:

This demo is not feature-complete. Here's a glimpse of what's coming in the full game.

  • More creatures, more colors, more variety!

  • World map with metagame progression: Build colonies in different biomes, each offering unique strategic resources.

  • Trade: Establish resource-specialized colonies and later import those resources to cultivate increasingly powerful colonies.

  • Colony defense: Protect your creations from invading organisms and spreading viruses. Trace threats back to their source and eliminate them.

  • Creature evolution: Mutate and adapt your organisms to thrive in diverse environments.

  • Semi-procedural biomes: Explore a large selection of hand-crafted terrains, dynamically populated with goodies and challenges, offering a fresh experience with every replay.

Ready to dive deeper? Wishlist the full game to stay updated and experience Animacules in its entirety!
